meanings.definition: To place in or pack into a container.
meanings.sent1: I am containerizing my toys in the box.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys containerizing her snacks for the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was containerizing nuts in its cheeks.
meanings.sent4: The students were containerizing knowledge in their minds.
meanings.sent5: Containerizing the ingredients made baking easier.

meanings.definition: To adapt (software) for use in a containerized environment.
meanings.sent1: The developers are containerizing the application for cloud deployment.
meanings.sent2: Containerizing the code allows for easier deployment across servers.
meanings.sent3: The software engineer was containerizing the program with precision.
meanings.sent4: She was containerizing the data to ensure seamless integration.
meanings.sent5: Containerizing the software streamlines the development process.
